Name: pilgrim_gsa
Title: Obelisk for those Indians Killed in 1857
Review: On the banks of Gomti is located this Obelisk for Indians killed in uprising of 1857 .A white Obelisk set amidst a garden near the Residency .No entrance ticket .Good photo back drop.

Name: Tanvi
Title: Located near gomati river
Review: It is built to pay tribute to martyes who losed their life for freedom of our country . It was well maintained and good .

Name: Yogesh P
Title: Very near to Gimti river
Review: This place was located very near to Gomti river.  Place was built to remember brave soldiers. Well developed and well maintained.

Name: niya27
Title: On the bank of Gomti river
Review: It is a minar which is erected in remembrance to martyrs died during Indian independence. The view of Gomti river is awesome from here. The park surrounding this attraction is also nice.

Name: kushBans
Title: PAtriotic !!
Review: this place is not very crowded or dense. Can give a visit anytime. Not so good neither so bad. Give it a try !

Name: Amit M
Title: War Memorial
Review: The Shaheed Smarak was built to pay tribute to martyrs of first war of Independence. Made up of white marbal. Mainly visited by locals for a evening stroll and international tourists for history. Devoted 15 mins there.

Name: Rohit T
Title: Icon of Lucknow
Review: Located on the banks of River Gomti, this is a landmark tourist destination, facing Residency. The white tower pays true homage to the martyrs

Name: Aarav K
Title: Shaheed
Review: Shaheed smarak is a memorial place, located in bank of gomti nagar lucknow. Here is a pillar made of white marbal. Really this is very beautiful. Must visit.

Name: Rajani B
Title: Memorial for the martyrs of First War of Independence
Review: This memorial was erected to pay tribute to the martyrs of India's first war of Independence.  The memorial is made in marble and has beautiful architecture.  It's surrounded by garden on three sides and there is river Gomti flowing on the fourth side. Place is rich in scenic beauty and is rejuvenating.

Name: YatriForever
Title: Nice Stupa in memory of Matyrs
Review: This is a tall, well built stupa Memorial to salute those who laid thier lives for the freedom of the nation. Since we were staying in Riverbank Colony, it was easy to walk up here. The upkeep of the park is not at its best and the Gomti was dirty, some sort of dredging was going on. If you happen to be in this area of Lucknow or visiting the Planetarium, its worth a quick visit here. This is not exactly a tourist attraction.

Name: Hemant K
Title: Quiet serene place on bank of river Gomti
Review: It is a small clean park on the banks of river Gomti with a pillar honouring the martyrs. Therefore the name is Shaheed Smark, A good place to just sit, relax and admire the Gomti river. Boating is also available. It is easily accessible and is in the middle of the city.

Name: msadiqsalman
Title: A Place best for Solitude lovers
Review: Its a well maintained park, easily accessible and visited by couples and families.It has an option for boating in the Gomti river !! A nice experience and there is almost no waiting period.

Name: sid_ups
Title: Tribte for Great Indian Soldiers
Review: This is situated on the bank of Gomti River and is a white marble pillar stands in the middle of the Garden.

Name: P N M
Title: Nice
Review: It has good picnic spot . Shaheed Smarak is situated at the bank of Gomati river ,so that Boating facilities are there with your family. You can enjoy there with full of fun

Name: AsisBandyopadhyay
Title: A quiet place to pay homage to the martyrs
Review: Located on the bank of Gomti, it is a tall tower with clean cemented space where one can take a stroll and pay respect to the martyrs. The stairs from the road are quite a few so reaching close to the tower involves little physical effort.

Name: Alok N
Title: WHITE MARBLE-IMPRESSIVE
Review: It is one of the modern day creations but impressive and the views are nice with the Gomti river flowing below it. Not many people visit it as it is not part of the Guided tour.

Name: Dharmendra S
Title: Must see
Review: This shaheed smarak located at Ring road Sitapur bypass at the Gomti river bank in memory of freedom fighters involved in Kakori kand. Must see,. Nice place

Name: Manish B
Title: Dedicated to martyrs
Review: The place is dedicated to brave indian solders who gave away their life for the country. Beautiful white marble memorial in middle of the park. Good place to visit and spend some time in relax.

Name: Arpitgupta25
Title: Memorial only visit
Review: It is near gomti river and only war memorial and in evening there are some crowds otherwise it is empty...

Name: Atif M
Title: its war memorial
Review: near gomti river, war memorial. not much to be seen, still crowded by locals. around nice place to sit and relax

Name: nidhi2099
Title: Terrible!
Review: Absolutely nothing to offer as of now! I guess they are planning to develop the area as a green belt but all I could see right now was debris and dirt. May be in an year or so, it will improve. For now, please don't waste your time in visiting this place.

Name: sumantra_travel
Title: Shaheed Smarak, Lucknow, 19 Sep'15
Review: 19 September, 2015.As we neared the British Residency on our two-day tour ofLucknow, our auto-rickshaw driver pointed us to the Shaheed Smarak, a monument erected in honour of the martyrs of the FirstWar of Indian Independence of 1857. The memorial is located on the banks of the riverGomti, and is constructed in a small park on the banks of the river.We had gone there in the hot afternoon, where the cool shade of the trees complemented a cool breeze across a clean stretch of the Gomti river, which flows past the place.There is a tall white monument in the main part of the park, andanother monument to the right (as one faces the tall mainmonument), in honour of the great freedom fighter, Shaheed BhagatSingh, with a bust of the freedom fighter displayed on it.

Name: manoj k
Title: leisure time visit
Review: one can go to the place to enjoy the place to have some relaxing time. Paddle boat ride can be  enjoyed over here.

Name: chetan1586
Title: Symbol of Tribute to martyrs
Review: Shaheed Smarak is built on the banks of river gomti & is a symbol of tribute to the martyrs who laid their lives.This place is a little mismanaged & the surroundings are not properly kept

Name: Pallavi S
Title: Valndalized and dirty
Review: You would expect more care to be taken of the martyr's memorial. There is no lighting, the place is unkempt, dirty and littered with garbage. Wish someone would take cognizance and do something to make it clean and presentable again.

Name: HBHB59
Title: A great monuments for those who laid lives for the country
Review: A white monument created in early 1960s on the banks of river Gomti. The place gives a great view of the city across the river including the bridges. Quite nice place to visit around sunset. With four elephants in white on the ground of the base the whole place is very elegant.

Name: SKBhatiya
Title: Just another building
Review: Used to give me the shivers when it was made 20 yeas ago, now its just another landmark. Its activity for a couple of hours

Name: sangeetasrivastava
Title: Place for Evening stroll
Review: Built on the banks of river Gomti, it is a tribute to the heroes of India’s First War of Independence. Lush green gardens, boating in the river and natural greenery are its major attractions.

Name: ApurbaRoy
Title: place
Review: A historic place in city of Nawabs- Lucknow near the bank of river Gomti. A good place to see specially for those who has inclination to know about Indian History- specially during British period

Name: Ruchi_Ahuja87
Title: Nice place to relax!
Review: This is a memorial built in the memory of unknown soldiers who laid their lives during the freedom struggle. It is only a structure and does not require much time to see per say. However area around has been well created. There are big steps where one can sit back and relax. Also this place is right by the banks of the Gomti river, hence the views are nice and this also makes the weather pleasant always. You can also go further down for boating on the Gomti river

Name: Sanyashree
Title: For the Martyrs
Review: A beautiful way of paying tribute to the brave heroes of the city. Not much to see at this place, just the smarak is there.
